p: Welcome to the EasyApps Documentation Page.

EasyApps is a brand-new application solution for Discord servers. All actions can be executed directly from Discord. This guide is designed for all users, regardless of prior experience with other Discord bots. It provides detailed information regarding each command.
If you have any questions, you can visit our support server or go over the FAQ page. We are ready to assist you with your inquiries.
EasyApps is very easy to set up, requiring only a few seconds before you can begin building your applications.
To set up EasyApps, the server owner must run the command: /server_setup During this process, you will be asked to give:
After submitting the required information, the setup is complete. You can immediately begin creating and managing applications.
as always, your love alex xoxo

Here, you can learn about how to create, edit, and remove applications, and how people apply for the application you made! Whether it's a moderator application, a designer or any other, EasyApps got you covered with an unlimited number of questions!

All those functions can help you manage applications to your liking. You can make as many questions, edit applications after they are submitted and just fully remove applications if you don't need them. There is no limit on how many applications you can make!
Channel, where filled applications for review will go.
In the panel, you can also find a dropdown menu with the following options. The dropdown menu was made to easily navigate the Menu, grouping everything into their own section for readability.
In the panel/embed, you can see a couple of options, which are necessary for applications.
Log Channel, Application Name editing, Application Roles Management, Open/Close Application.
The log channel must be filled to create the application.
The role that is given to people who failed their application.
The role that is given to people who have applied.
The role that is given to people who passed their application.
To create an application, first you have to run the command /create_application. This command will open up a panel like below.
Whether the application is opened or not - whether people can apply for it.
To edit applications, run the /edit_application command, and you are met with the same panel as in Creating Applications.
To remove applications, run the /remove_application command.
Here, you can find a list of all commands that you can use with EasyApps. Those can be used on your Discord server.
Commands that are related to applications.
Starts a process of creating an application.
Allows people to apply for an application.
Commands that can help you with the usage of easyApps.
Starts a process of setting up EasyApps for a specific server. More can be found in here.
Join our Discord server and do not hesitate to open a ticket. We are here to help.
